Stealing church movies and helping others steal them as well?  I can understand corrupt people stealing porn, but church movies???  All the stolen church movies in the world aren't going to help you better teach your children to be honorable and faithful to God.

Someday someone will ask you if have been honest in your dealings...and I truly hope you will be able to answer that question with a clean conscience.
